/* getArchiveTreeList */ SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT '11111' AS C_AIKEYCODE, '기록물철' AS C_AITITLE, '1' AS C_AIOLDFLAG, '1' AS ARCHIVETYPE, '1' AS C_AITYPE, '1' AS C_AIPRESERVE, '1' AS PRESERVENAME, '1' AS C_AICHARGEFLAG, '00000000000' AS UPPER_CODE, ' ' as UPPER_TYPE, 'r' AS CONTENTTYPE, 'open' AS STATE, '1' AS ORD, 1 AS ODR, '' AS WIKEY, '' AS WINAME, '' AS AISTOPYEAR, '' AS C_WIGUBUN, 1 AS LANK FROM DUAL
UNION ALL SELECT c_aistopyear AS C_AIKEYCODE, c_aistopyear AS C_AITITLE, '1' AS C_AIOLDFLAG, '1' AS ARCHIVETYPE, '1' AS C_AITYPE, '1' AS C_AIPRESERVE, '1' AS PRESERVENAME, '1' AS C_AICHARGEFLAG, '11111' AS UPPER_CODE, 'r' as UPPER_TYPE, 'm' AS CONTENTTYPE, CASE WHEN c_aistopyear = IFNULL(#{searchYear} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')) THEN 'open' ELSE 'close' END AS STATE, '2' AS ORD, (CONVERT(c_aistopyear - DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') , INT) * -1 ) as ODR, '' AS WIKEY, '' AS WINAME, '' AS AISTOPYEAR, '' AS C_WIGUBUN, 1 AS LANK FROM NEOS.A_ARCHIVEINFO WHERE C_AIOWNORGCODE = #{manageDeptSeq} AND IFNULL(C_AIDELETEOPT, '') = '' AND C_AITRANSFERFLAG > ' ' AND C_AIOKFLAG = '1' AND C_AICHARGEFLAG IN ('0','1')
AND C_AISTOPYEAR in (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR), '%Y'))
GROUP BY C_AISTOPYEAR
UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(wi.C_WIKEY, ai.c_aistopyear) AS C_AIKEYCODE, C_WINAME AS C_AITITLE, '1' AS C_AIOLDFLAG, '1' AS ARCHIVETYPE, '1' AS C_AITYPE, '1' AS C_AIPRESERVE, '1' AS PRESERVENAME, '1' AS C_AICHARGEFLAG ,
c_aistopyear AS UPPER_CODE, 'm' as UPPER_TYPE,
'11111' AS UPPER_CODE, 'r' as UPPER_TYPE,
'd' AS CONTENTTYPE, 'open' AS STATE, '3' AS ORD, IFNULL(wi.C_WIDISPLAY,9999) AS ODR, '' AS WIKEY, '' AS WINAME, '' AS AISTOPYEAR, C_WIGUBUN AS C_WIGUBUN, CASE WHEN C_WIGUBUN = 'g' THEN 1 WHEN C_WIGUBUN = 'c' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END AS LANK FROM NEOS.A_WORKCODEINFO wi , NEOS.A_ARCHIVEINFO AI WHERE wi.C_WIKEY = ai.C_WIKEY AND wi.C_WISTATUS <> '3' AND ai.C_AIOWNORGCODE = #{manageDeptSeq} AND IFNULL(C_WIDELETEOPT,'') = ''
AND AI.C_AISTOPYEAR = #{searchYear}
AND AI.C_AISTOPYEAR in (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR), '%Y'))
AND AI.C_AISTOPYEAR = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y')
AND IFNULL(C_AIDELETEOPT, '') = '' AND C_AITRANSFERFLAG > ' ' AND C_AIOKFLAG = '1' AND C_AICHARGEFLAG IN ('0','1')
GROUP BY ai.c_aistopyear, wi.c_wikey
GROUP BY wi.c_wikey
UNION ALL SELECT AI.C_AIKEYCODE, AI.C_AITITLE, AI.C_AIOLDFLAG, NEOS.GET_CODE_DETAIL_Info('0', 'COM135', AI.C_AITYPE ,#{loginVo.langCode}) AS ARCHIVETYPE, AI.C_AITYPE, AI.C_AIPRESERVE, NEOS.GET_CODE_DETAIL_Info('0', 'COM104', AI.C_AIPRESERVE ,#{loginVo.langCode}) AS PRESERVENAME, AI.C_AICHARGEFLAG, CONCAT(WI.C_WIKEY, AI.C_AISTOPYEAR) AS UPPER_CODE, 'd' as UPPER_TYPE, 'a' AS CONTENTTYPE, 'close' AS STATE, '4' AS ORD, IFNULL(AI.ORD, 9999) AS ODR, WI.C_WIKEY AS WIKEY, WI.C_WINAME AS WINAME, AI.C_AISTOPYEAR AS AISTOPYEAR, '' AS C_WIGUBUN, 1 AS LANK FROM NEOS.A_ARCHIVEINFO AI, NEOS.A_WORKCODEINFO WI WHERE 1=1
AND AI.C_AISTOPYEAR = #{searchYear}
AND AI.C_AISTOPYEAR in (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'),DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR), '%Y'))
AND AI.C_AISTOPYEAR = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y')
AND WI.C_WIKEY = AI.C_WIKEY AND IFNULL(AI.C_AIDELETEOPT,'') = '' AND AI.C_AITRANSFERFLAG > ' ' AND AI.C_AIOKFLAG = '1' AND AI.C_AICHARGEFLAG IN ('0','1') AND AI.C_AITITLE > ' ' AND AI.C_AIOWNORGCODE = #{manageDeptSeq} AND IFNULL(C_AIDELETEOPT, '') = '' AND IFNULL(C_WIDELETEOPT,'') = '' AND WI.C_WISTATUS <> '3' ) T
WHERE C_AITITLE like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND CONTENTTYPE = 'a'
ORDER BY ORD, LANK, ODR, C_AITITLE

SELECT VUI.EMP_SEQ, VUI.EMP_NAME, VUI.DEPT_SEQ, VUI.DEPT_NAME, (SELECT DP_NAME FROM DJ_EPIS.V_DP_CODE_INFO WHERE DP_SEQ = VUI.POSITION_CODE) AS POSITION_NAME, (SELECT DP_NAME FROM DJ_EPIS.V_DP_CODE_INFO WHERE DP_SEQ = VUI.DUTY_CODE) AS DUTY_NAME FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS RNUM, E.EMP_SEQ AS EMP_SEQ, E.LOGIN_ID AS USER_ID, E.LOGIN_PASSWD AS USER_PW, E.ERP_EMP_NUM AS ERP_EMP_NUM, EM.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NAME, ED.DEPT_SEQ AS DEPT_SEQ, DM.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_NAME, EC.JOB_CODE AS JOB_CODE, EC.STATUS_CODE AS STATUS_CODE, ED.DUTY_CODE AS DUTY_CODE, ED.POSITION_CODE AS POSITION_CODE, E.GENDER_CODE AS GENDER_CODE, DATE_FORMAT(E.JOIN_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS JOIN_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(EC.RESIGN_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RESIGN_DAY, EC.WORK_STATUS AS WORK_STATUS, E.USE_YN AS USE_YN FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R, NEOS.T_CO_EMP E LEFT JOIN NEOS.T_CO_EMP_MULTI EM ON E.GROUP_SEQ = EM.GROUP_SEQ AND E.EMP_SEQ = EM.EMP_SEQ AND EM.LANG_CODE = 'kr' LEFT JOIN NEOS.T_CO_EMP_DEPT ED ON E.GROUP_SEQ = ED.GROUP_SEQ AND E.EMP_SEQ = ED.EMP_SEQ AND ED.MAIN_DEPT_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN NEOS.T_CO_COMP C ON E.GROUP_SEQ = C.GROUP_SEQ AND ED.COMP_SEQ = C.COMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN NEOS.T_CO_DEPT_MULTI DM ON E.GROUP_SEQ = DM.GROUP_SEQ AND C.COMP_SEQ = DM.COMP_SEQ AND ED.DEPT_SEQ = DM.DEPT_SEQ AND DM.LANG_CODE = 'kr' LEFT JOIN NEOS.T_CO_EMP_COMP EC ON EC.COMP_SEQ = C.COMP_SEQ AND EC.EMP_SEQ = E.EMP_SEQ WHERE E.USE_YN != 'D' AND E.USE_YN = 'Y' )VUI WHERE VUI.USE_YN = 'Y' AND VUI.EMP_SEQ = #{approveEmpSeq}

SELECT DI.DOC_ID, DI.DOC_NO, DI.DOC_TITLE, DI.DOC_CONTENT, DI.DRAFT_EMP_SEQ, DI.LAST_APPROVE_EMP_SEQ, DI.DRAFT_DT, DI.APPROVE_STAT_CODE, DI.ATFILE_SN, FI.FILE_PATH, FI.FILE_UUID, FI.FILE_ORG_NAME, FI.FILE_EXT, CONCAT('/', SUBSTRING_INDEX(FILE_PATH, '/', -7), FI.FILE_UUID) AS FILE_DOWN_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DJ_EPIS.V_FILE_INFO WHERE DOC_ID = #{docId}) as FILE_CONT FROM DJ_EPIS.V_DOC_INFO DI JOIN DJ_EPIS.V_FILE_INFO FI ON DI.ATFILE_SN = FI.FILE_NO WHERE DI.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND DI.DOC_ID = #{docId}

SELECT FI.FILE_NO, FI.FILE_ORG_NAME AS filename, FI.FILE_EXT, FI.FILE_SIZE, FI.FILE_UUID AS fileUUID, FI.FILE_PATH AS FILE_DOWN_PATH -- CONCAT('/upload/', FI.FILE_CD, '/', DATE_FORMAT(FI.REG_DT, '%Y/%m/%d'), '/') AS FILE_DOWN_PATH FROM DJ_EPIS.V_FILE_INFO FI WHERE DOC_ID = #{docId}

/* getDocApproveAllRoute */
SELECT DI.LAST_APPROVE_EMP_SEQ, DI.LAST_APPROVE_EMP_NAME, DAR.APPROVE_ROUTE_ID, DAR.APPROVE_EMP_SEQ, DAR.APPROVE_EMP_NAME, DAR.APPROVE_DEPT_NAME, DAR.APPROVE_POSITION_NAME, DAR.APPROVE_DUTY_NAME, DAR.APPROVE_STAT_CODE_DESC, DAR.APPROVE_STAT_CODE, DATE_FORMAT(DAR.APPROVE_DT, '%Y. %m. %d') AS APPROVE_DT, DAR.APPROVE_ORDER FROM DJ_EPIS.V_DOC_INFO DI JOIN DJ_EPIS.V_DOC_APPROVE_ROUTE DAR ON DAR.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE DI.DOC_ID = #{docId} ORDER BY DAR.APPROVE_ORDER ASC
